content: <style=SizeBig>A mountain has risen!</style> {A想到了}How magnificent... the planet really has grown... Hoho?
info: 星球树等级3级-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A远眺}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, did have you noticed? Up on the higher ground, perhaps... just maybe... There's a different ecosystem up there.
info: 星球树等级3级-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: I've seen different insects... different colored flowers... This Inspo Card will let you craft a <style=Highlight>ramp</style> to reach higher ground.
info: 星球树等级3级-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Oh, sorry to trouble you. If you happen to get an idea for a new Inspo Card while picking <style=Highlight>flowers</style> on the hill...

content: {A害羞挠头}Do make a <style=Highlight>tricolor flower pot</style>, won't you? Hoho! If you could set it on the table in the camp, it'd fill the place with the sweet fragrance of flowers.
